content: Getting clean on the go has never been easier than with these big baby wipes for adults. These eco-friendly pads are made from all natural spunlace cotton that’s extremely soft to the touch and measure an impressive 12″ x 24″.

Make the most out of your limited closet space by hanging your garments on these space saving clothing hangers. The innovative design eliminates the empty space in between the rod and your clothes so they hang higher – providing more space below.

Bring your designs to life with electronic sensors, motors and connected apps. These LEGO-like building blocks are designed to safely conduct electricity and can sync with your smartphone so you can control the structure remotely.

Cubetto is the hands-on coding toy designed to introduce kids to the world of programming from an early age. It uses a set of colorful coding blocks and instructions, allowing your kids to create actual programs that move the little Cubetto around.

Bring living-room-style comfort to the great outdoors with this ultimate inflatable air lounger. This ultra lightweight and portable piece of furniture inflates in mere seconds, floats, and can be used over a variety of rugged terrains without risk of popping.

Give your game nights some added flair and durability by incorporating some of these bulletproof glass dice. They are available in a wide range of vibrantly colored polyhedral dice with your choose of anything from D4 to D100.

Add a touch of sophistication to your drinks by making some crystal clear cubes of ice using this specialized tray. The innovative design of the tray mimics the natural freezing process to quickly and easily create aesthetically pleasing crystal clear cubes.

The smart parka is the last winter coat you’ll ever need to own. Available in both men’s and women’s sizes, this water resistant parka is designed with features like built-in gloves, a hat pocket, and a removable lining so you can adjust it according to the weather conditions.

Now you can transform your smartphone into a 3D printer – yes, you read that right! This compact, inexpensive, and revolutionary device utilizes daylight resins in conjunction with light from your smartphone’s screen to print 3D objects.

The hottest thing to hit planet earth since that meteor that killed all those dinosaurs long ago – these free-range dinosaur eggs take just 6 million years to hatch – though if you can’t wait, you’ll be greeted by a cuddly dead baby dinosaur inside. Your call.

Revolutionize the way you enjoy your meals and treats by using edible cutlery. Designed to replace wasteful plastic utensil usage, this vegan friendly cutlery is designed so it’s easy to grab and comes in three varieties including rice, wheat, and sorghum.

Now you can always get an even cook over an open flame by placing your food on this always flat campfire cooking stick. This hinged campfire cooker’s design holds your impaled food flat over the fire to ensure the heat is always distributed evenly.

Eliminate annoying cable clutter once and for all by juicing up your devices with this tangle free data/charging cable. The compact design lays flat like a card and can easily be stretched to accommodate any device.

Simplify the way you prepare everyday meals by cooking them using this multi-function smart oven. It’s designed to switch seamlessly between steaming, baking, broiling, and convection heating to get the best possible flavor and texture from chef-curated meals.

No one likes playing with dirty balls – these beer pong nets create a physical barrier so that if a shooter misses, the ball conveniently slides down the net and onto the table. The net is designed to easily attach to a variety of tables and is machine washable..

Learning to play an instrument has never been easier or more convenient thanks to these online piano lessons. Instead of spending a bundle on a tutor, you’ll learn how to tickle the ivories just like the pros at a fraction of the price.

Cook rustic outdoor meals just as easily as if you were indoors using this mighty field skillet. Modeled after vintage American skillets, this lightweight cast iron pan can handle anything from meats to flaky pie crusts, and only gets better with time and use.

Learn the ins and out of the multi-billion dollar fashion industry by reading the ultimate fashion bible. Fashionpedia acts as a visual dictionary that guides you through every facet of the industry – from technical terms to its fascinating history.

Instantly illuminate your surroundings with one of these tiny flashlights in a matchbook. Available in three vibrant colors, each miniature flashlight is completely waterproof and built with a magnetic base so you can stick them almost anywhere.

Harness the power of the sun to warm yourself up 20 degrees in just 2 minutes with this solar powered thermal jacket. Available in men’s and women’s sizes, these thermal jackets are waterproof and breathable so you can stay warm without needing a bulky jacket.

These carbon fiber sunglasses provide superb protection from sunlight without sacrificing style. The glasses sport a durable carbon fiber frame and feature a seven layer scratch resistant lens available in either black, blue, or golden shades.

Get the younger generation interested in politics by making them feel the Bern with this Bernie Sanders action figure. Ol’ Bernie comes dressed in an elegant black suit and sports his trademark white hair and bespectacled look.

The world is a disgusting cesspool of disease and filth. As a rational human being, you can finally protect yourself from whatever life threatening diseases may lurk underneath public door handles by using this door handle opener.

Make ice cubes in a fraction of the time by using this flash freezing tray. Each triangular tray features a special internal cooling fluid designed to store up coldness from the freezer and rapidly release it back into the tray so its contents cool in just 10 minutes.

Charge all your devices using just one cable! The Android & iOS common connector cable breaks down the barrier between lightning and micro USB ports so that you can charge anything from an iPhone to a Galaxy with ease.

Reuse and recycle all kinds of plastic bottles with this plastic bottle cutter. The cutter allows you to get more use out of discarded plastic bottles by slicing them into brightly colored plastic ropes that you can use for a variety of craft projects.

The smart modular power strip’s functional design allows you to customize its layout to fit your particular charging needs. You’ll be able to mix and match the various modules and then wirelessly control the devices that are plugged in using your smartphone.

Make the most of your kitchen’s limited counter space with help from this pot lid holder. This ingenious device attaches to the pot and provides a secure space to rest lids, spoons, ladles, and other kitchen utensils when they’re not in use.

Improve your working environment when on the go by using this laptop bag that doubles as a stand. It features an elegant water-resistant exterior and can be folded back to create a stable and elevated stand for your laptop.

Keep your coffee/tea at the ideal temperature by serving it inside of the stone cup. Crafted from metamorphic rock, the cup can either be cooled or heated prior to serving, so you can experience your drink’s natural flavor.

The Ellum solar is an intuitive smart light, embedded with sensors that illuminate the dark when motion is detected. It attaches magnetically, has a touch dimmer to manually adjust the brightness, and provides six months of use on just a single day of charging.

Microscape’s models are detailed 1:5000 scale replicas of iconic urban environments, like the Empire State building, and the United Nations HQ. They are 3D printed using aerial scan data that displays cityscapes in its most up to date layout.

Simplify your parenting duties when you’re out and about with your little one by placing her in this self driving smart stroller. This rolling nursery comes with an electric motor that propels the stroller automatically and features a built-in bottle warmer and rocker.

Party like a true patriot by trading in your freedom hating imported spirits for some good old fashioned ‘Murica Moonshine. Each bottle of white lightning is distilled in the good ‘ol U.S. of A. for unmatched flavor and potency.

Light up any dark path while still keeping your hands free by using this flexible light strap. This waterproof tool comes outfitted with 5 ultra bright LEDs that provide up to 800 lumens of output attached to a flexible belt that can be affixed virtually anywhere.

See if you’ve got what it takes to make it through the zombie apocalypse by playing a round of the Walking Dead miniatures game. Based on the iconic comic series, you’ll get to play as your favorite characters while going up against walkers and other groups.

Improve your daily commute by getting from point A to point B effortlessly using the world’s lightest electric scooter. Weighing just under 9 pounds, this ultra portable scooter features a powerful and durable battery capable of reaching speeds up to 12.5 mph.

Keep your unused luggage out of sight without sacrificing storage space using this smart collapsible hard suitcase. Its unique design allows you to flatten the entire suitcase down to just 3 inches in width, so you can easily hang it on a closet rack.

Astound onlookers by defying gravity in your home with this levitating air plant. Using magnetic levitation to create the eye-catching effect, this small green plant cube quietly hovers and rotates over the wooden base as your plant peacefully grows.

This re-engineered travel pillow will ensure you get a good night’s sleep even in the most uncomfortable of seats. It fits snugly under your head and holds it in place so you’ll never bob around from side to side as you doze off.

Increase the functionality of your home’s outlets by outfitting your walls with these pop out outlet multipliers. With the simple push of a button, the number of disposable outlets doubles so you can accommodate all your electronic devices.

Class up your game room setup by swapping out your old dice for these cast metal gaming dice. Available in a variety of shapes that range from D4 to D20, they’re made by hand and are offered in various finishes like aluminum and yellow brass.

Keep your phone fully juiced while you relax with a refreshing drink by using this phone charging drink coaster. This elegant bamboo coaster is the perfect way to charge your device when there’s no traditional outlets available – such as a crowded coffee shop.

This one of a kind world metro map gives you a first hand look at what our planet would look like if it was interconnected by one massive and borderless metro. Nearly every single station in the world is represented – totaling 214 cities, 791 lines, and 11,924 stations.

Get a flame going even in damp or windy conditions by using this survival fire starter pen. This battery operated tool features a copper tip designed to immediately create a spark when placed next to steel wool and is compact enough to carry anywhere.

Fully immerse yourself in your favorite videogame like never before by wearing this full body haptic suit. This futuristic styled suit features a state of the art electro-tactile haptic feedback system that lets you touch and feel your virtual surroundings.

Enjoy a comfy nap anytime and anywhere by wearing this inflatable sleep hoodie. Apart from the slim-fit and fashionable color options, the hoodie can be inflated into a soft and ergonomic pillow so you can comfortably rest while on the go.

Improve visibility in any situation by whipping out this bullet LED flashlight. Despite its compact bullet sized frame that makes it remarkably convenient to carry, it emits a powerful white light from the tip that you can activate with a simple twist.

Spice up your boring diet with a little flavor using this all in one seasoning system. No matter what type of food you’re preparing, these vegan-friendly spices go great on anything, are made from all natural ingredients, and are available in four flavorful seasoning styles.

Change the look of your ride with the swipe of a finger using this app controlled automotive lighting system. After installation, these waterproof and Bluetooth enabled lighting strips can be customized with thousands of color combinations using the app.

Stay on top of your busy and ever-changing schedule by writing down all your appointments in this reusable whiteboard planner. It features weekly, monthly, yearly, and goal-setting pages that are coated in a dry-erasable surface that is rewritable.

Ensure you have enough space to plug in all your devices while you travel by bringing along this revolutionary portable power strip. Smaller than an actual doughnut, this power strip manages to fit five outlets and two USB ports into its sleek design.

Set up the perfect storage system anywhere in your home using this modular hexagon shelving system. Available in either a 6″ or 12″ model, the shelves can easily be stacked on top of each other or placed side by side to create a honeycomb-like structure.

Eliminate the need for lugging around heavy rails when you want to capture a moving time lapse by using this specially designed camera trolley. Instead of setting up a complex rig, simply string a cord between two posts and your camera will function as a trolley.

Discover the amazing microcosm that surrounds us at all times using this credit card sized professional microscope. This sleek gadget utilizes your phone’s zoom capabilities to provide up to 320x magnification while transmitting everything to the phone’s screen.

Have everything you need to cook close at hand by preparing your meals on the ultimate cutting board. This Swiss Army knife of cutting boards features everything from knife storage and a removable juicer to a cheese grater and measuring cups.

Stay nice and dry next time you get caught in the rain by wearing this waterproof and breathable hoodie. It features a clear water repellent coating over the entire surface in addition to a range of concealed pockets so you can easily carry around all your gear.

Place a new spin on game night by conducting it in the dark and playing with these black light cards. This one of a kind deck features a psychedelic theme that comes alive once the lights go off and the black light is turned on.

Experience the real sense of shooting a gun and feeling the recoil while playing an FPS game using the Rail Gun controller attachment. It can be equipped onto an air soft gun and is designed so you can turn 180 or 360 degrees in game.

Help Mother Earth by cleaning her waters with this ocean trash collecting machine. After placing it into the water, this automated machine begins sucking up filthy water – without harming marine life – collecting trash and harmful oils inside of it.

Stave off boredom without gluing yourself to the TV by playing with this magnetic game system instead. The system is composed of dozens of different colored and shaped magnetic pieces you can connect together or bounce off each other.

With this detachable blade multi-tool you’ll be able to keep an array of useful tools on you without creating a cumbersome bulk. The ultra sleek design is thin enough to fit in your wallet yet features five practical tools like a screwdriver, knife, and mini pry bar.

Get today’s forecast right in your living room using this ambient weather display device. It syncs to your smartphone to get the latest weather data and displays it in a visual way inside the clear rectangle – producing everything from clouds and snow to rain and lightning.

Increase your chances of survival when you’re in the wild by bringing along this 12-in-1 tactical utility pendant. Though small in size, every inch of this pendant acts as a useful tool like a knife, hammer punch, arrowhead, and multi-wrench.

Thieves. Rain. Potholes. The city-proof bicycle will conquer them all. This one of a kind ride comes equipped with a rust-stopping chain, waterproof saddle, and puncture resistant tires in addition to a 24-hour replacement guarantee if it’s ever stolen.

Bring all the fun of an arcade into your home without taking up too much space using the modern retro arcade cabinet. It sports a sleek minimalist design that attaches to the wall, lets you play all your favorite games, and lets you play either single or multiplayer.

Keep a useful array of tools on you at all times without the bulk by carrying around this survival credit card holder. Apart from firmly securing your precious plastic, the super slim and sturdy frame stores over seven everyday tools like a compass and screw driver.

Ensure you’re equipped to handle any situation you encounter in the wild by having this outdoor survival multi-tool shovel at your side. It features a solid carbon fiber steel construction and includes eight useful tools such as a hammer, a pickaxe, and even a saw.

Instantly turn any helmet into a smart helmet using this revolutionary kit. The most advanced helmet mounted accessory ever built, it comes in a sturdy waterproof housing and is equipped with everything from an accelerometer, a HD camera, Wi-Fi, and a GPS.

Avoid being stuck with a damaged phone just because you had one little fall by outfitting your device with this iPhone screen glass protector. It comes reinforced with a nanomaterial coating that makes the screen durable against drops and heavy impacts.

The flying personal robot is the revolutionary new drone designed to prevent injury and improve your flying experience. It comes with an on-board computer, mounted HD camera and features a design that conceals the rotor blades with a protective grid.

The Ultimate NES Library Guide is a mammoth 450 page book that comes filled with every little detail of over 750 NES games – such as their release date, developer, genre, availability, as well as a full review and rating for each title.

Conserve heat and lower your electric bill throughout the cold winter months by setting up this room in a room. The small tent fits directly over your existing bed, can be fitted with a light, and features a mesh top designed to ventilate the air.

This simplified smartphone attachment is a clever product aimed at facilitating smartphone usage for the elderly and disabled. Instead of a complex touchscreen, interaction is accomplished via a large full tactile keyboard and front display.

Bring the majesty of the ocean to your room using this jellyfish cylinder aquarium. The graceful movements of the tiny jellyfish help create a soothing environment while the built in LEDs create cool accent lighting for your room.

Give your favorite board game some added edge by swapping out the classic dice for this metal LED version. Crafted from a solid block of aluminum, this sleek and modern dice features internal LEDs designed to give each side a different colored glow.

Listen to your favorite tunes with unparalleled comfort using these quick custom fitting wireless headphones. These revolutionary Bluetooth earphones feature tips that mold to the unique shape of your ears in just 60 seconds!

Ensure your phone stays powered up all day long with help from the world’s most compact solar charger. The ingenious and functional design lets you roll up a thin solar panel into a tiny cylinder – allowing you to have some serious energy generation without the bulk.

Experience the closest shave of your life by swapping your disposable out for the world’s sharpest razor. Previously priced at a whopping one hundred thousand dollars, the sapphire blade’s unique properties makes it ten times sharper than a surgeon’s scalpel!

Avoid breathing in the harmful toxins floating through the environment by measuring the air quality using this portable air pollution monitor. It’s designed to detect a wide range of harmful substances like carbon monoxide and other volatile substances in real time.

Keep discomfort levels at a minimum next time you surf the crimson wave by wearing these period-proof undies. These unique dual-layer undies feature bamboo microfiber, cotton, and a liquid blocker so you stay dry – eliminating the need for pads or tampons.

Enjoy a worry free day out on the water with the world’s first floating smartphone. This Android powered phone boasts a powerful processor, sleek design, and is completely buoyant so you never again have to worry about losing your phone in a deep body of water.

Reenact your favorite Star Wars fight scenes without fear of injuring your opponent using these foam lightsabers. They get their glow from embedded color changing LEDs and are fully encased in high quality foam making them ideal for actual sword fights.

Extend your phone’s life expectancy by avoiding accidental drops using this ring loop iPhone case. In addition to shielding its surface from minor bumps and scratches, the ring loop case ensures your phone remains firmly attached to your hand.

Ensure you’re never left stranded when trekking through the wild using this life saving portable solar battery. It comes with indicator lights so you know how much juice you have left and features four USB ports and a small S.O.S. emergency flashlight.

Easily transform any shoe into a comfy slip-on using the knot free shoelace system. Made from a high grade fiber reinforced resin, the simple design is easy enough for a child to use, yet tough enough for a triathlete to compete in.

Remain dry and comfortable throughout the day no matter what you’re up to by wearing these no sweat pants. Apart from looking stylish, they’re made using a revolutionary fabric infused with performance fibers that are odor resistant and moisture absorbing.

Keep your kitchen filled with fresh ingredients year round by supplying it with vegetables produced by this autonomous indoor garden. It automatically provides your plants with the lighting, nutrients, and irrigation necessary for them to flourish.

See what the unfinished Death Star II would have looked like completed by taking a gander at this Death Star blueprints poster. Designed by graphic artist Carlos Pardo, this stunning collectible gives you an in depth view of the colossal weaponized space station.

Increase the production value of your home movies by outfitting your iPhone with this vintage film camera case. The case helps stabilize your shots and can be outfitted with different lenses such as super wide and fish eye.

titleEN: Licensed Lord Of The Rings Coins
content: Become the coolest kid in the Shire by adding these licensed Lord Of The Rings coins to your currency collection. This coveted set of coins accurately depicts the currency used by Elves, Dwarves, and other beings throughout Tolkien’s Middle-earth.

Don’t panic when you’re stranded in the wild – because you’ve got the multi-tool survival knife! Forged from a single piece of stainless steel, the uniquely styled handle conceals over 7 useful tools like a wrench set, hammer head, ruler, and fire starter.

Keep your treasured cards and gaming paraphernalia safe and organized by storing them inside these spellbook gaming boxes. While the exterior resembles an antique spellbook, the inside is specially designed to accommodate everything from dice to cards.

Give your smartphone wings and watch it literally take flight using this smartphone piloted autonomous drone. Compatible with both Android and iOS platforms, it allows you to use your phone as an autonomous aerial camera cloud-connected vehicle.

With the smart microhabitat you can grow anything from a herb, vegetable or flower garden and even create a rainforest like environment for pets. This app-controlled habitat automatically regulates everything from temperature to humidity to lighting and ventilation!

Enjoy the sport of fishing virtually anywhere you travel by bringing along this compact fishing rod. Dubbed the Swiss Army knife of fishing rods, it’s made to be salt water resistant and features modular parts that can be interchanged to fit your style of fishing.

No post workout would be complete without downing a fortified six pack of protein infused beer, brah! Each drink comes packed with seven grams of whey protein – so you can meet your daily protein needs and keep getting dem gainz.

Lightbox is a kinetic, wireless light switch made from a solid chunk of real wood that controls many lamps in a room just by picking it up and turning it on its side. With one simple, elegant motion it will control as many lamps in a room as you like.

The mini museum is a portable collection of billions of years of life, science and history in the palm of your hand! Every mini museum features authentic, iconic and labeled rare specimens from earth and space – such as mammoth meat and raw emerald.

Take the guess work out of D&D gaming by playing with these self rolling sound activated gaming dice. These high-tech dice light up internally and can be programmed to automatically roll at the clap of your hands or snap of your fingers.
